[00:00.00]Let It Go (Explicit) - Summer Walker
[00:05.91]Lyrics by：Aubrey Robinson/Cam Griffin/Summer Walker/London Holmes/Kendall Roark Bailey
[00:11.82]Composed by：Aubrey Robinson/Cam Griffin/Summer Walker/London Holmes/Kendall Roark Bailey
[00:17.74]What have you become what have you become
[00:22.63]Matter fact no that's what you've been
[00:25.17]I was blind I was in it I was blind oh I
[00:33.25]I thought that I was changin' you
[00:37.50]I can't believe I praised you
[00:40.60]God d**n
[00:41.71]You know your mama ain't raised you like that
[00:46.03]Just look at your behavior
[00:48.09]And that's why she ashamed of ya d**n
[00:51.19]Look at what you've become
[00:52.74]Become
[00:53.35]Matter fact what you've been
[00:54.99]Been
[00:55.59]I was just blind
[00:57.72]I was just so in it
[00:59.26]In it
[00:59.70]I was just so committed
[01:01.30]'Mitted
[01:01.93]No I don't regret it
[01:03.44]'Gret it
[01:03.85]'Cause I learned what love is once I
[01:07.01]Let it go let it go let it go
[01:10.00]Oh-oh
[01:11.09]Let it go 'cause you're doin' too much and you just won't let go
[01:14.29]And I know it was you and you tryna hold onto my attention
[01:19.85]Won't you let it go oh ooh-oh
[01:23.86]Let it go let it go let it go
[01:27.99]Bae yeah 'cause you're doin' too much and you're tryin' too hard
[01:31.43]Tryna get a reaction
[01:32.92]I am a child of God
[01:35.83]Ayy yeah
[01:36.89]So I cannot be touched
[01:39.86]Ah-ah
[01:41.98]When you have somethin' you treat it good
[01:43.98]And you want it bad and you need it
[01:46.49]I don't wanna be feelin' dead so I said that I was leavin'
[01:50.72]I thought you would be real
[01:52.43]Real
[01:52.86]I thought you would be right
[01:54.47]Be right
[01:54.91]Talkin' all of that tough s**t then you gon' go and dial 911
[01:59.94]I don't know where they where they do that at
[02:04.05]Oh yeah where they where they do that at
[02:08.27]I don't know where but all I really know is
[02:13.45]All I really know is
[02:15.14]Know is
[02:15.46]Let it go let it go
[02:18.90]Yeah
[02:19.07]Let it go let it go
[02:23.61]Oh-oh 'cause you're doin' too much and you just won't let go
[02:26.59]And I know it was you and you tryna hold on out of spite
[02:32.86]Let it go oh let it go
[02:41.03]Oh let it go
[02:45.24]Oh let it go
[02:49.25]Oh yeah-yeah
[02:53.69]Oh yeah-yeah
[02:58.02]Oh oh-oh
[02:59.02]Ooh
[03:02.11]Yeah yeah-yeah

[ti:Let It Go (Explicit)]
[ar:Summer Walker]

[00:17.74]你变成了哪般模样 你变成了哪般模样
[00:22.63]事实上 你一直都是这样
[00:25.17]我盲目无知 我曾为你着迷 我盲目无知
[00:33.25]我以为我在改变你
[00:37.50]难以置信 我曾对你赞赏有加
[00:40.60]天啊
[00:41.71]你知道你妈妈不是这样教育你的
[00:46.03]看看你的行为举止
[00:48.09]这是她为你感到羞愧的原因
[00:51.19]看看你现在的样子
[00:52.74]现在的样子
[00:53.35]事实上 你一直都是这样
[00:54.99]一直如此
[00:55.59]我只是盲目无知

[00:59.26]沉迷其中

[01:19.85]你是否愿意放手

[01:27.99]亲爱的因为你付出太多 你一直绞尽脑汁
[01:31.43]想得到回应

[01:46.49]我不想感到痛不欲生 所以我说我要离开
[01:50.72]我以为你情真意切
[01:52.43]情真意切
[01:52.86]我以为你会好起来
[01:54.47]好起来
[01:54.91]说了那么多不堪入耳的话 你转身离开 还拨打了报警电话

[02:08.27]我不知道身在何处 可我只知道

[02:15.14]知道

[02:19.07]放手吧 放手吧
[02:23.61]因为你付出太多 你始终无法释怀
